title: Chairperson. Committee of Vice Chancellors
description: Chairperson of the Committee of Vice Chancellors and Directors.

title: Times Higher Education
description: Under my leadership as the Vice Chancellor, the university was included in the Times Higher Education Impact Ranking for the first time in 2023.

title: New administrative initiative at RUSL
description: Under my leadership as the Vice Chancellor, many new initiatives were made at the Rajarata University of Sri Lanka

title: Panelist. ADB Skills Forum
description: Panelist at the 10th ADB Skills Forum as a Speaker of the Forum of University Presidents.at Asian Development Bank Headquarters, Manila

title: Live at Shanida Ayubowan TV Program
description: Live TV program - Shanida “Ayubowan” about Rajarata University's research, social mission, industrial collaborations, and research outcomes commercialization 31.12.2022. on Jathika Rupawahini.

title: Vice Chancellor. Rajarata University of Sri Lanka
description: Served as the 7th Vice Chancellor and first female Vice Chancellor of Rajarata University of Sri Lanka.

title: Founding Director. University Business Linkage Cell
description: Founding Director of the University Business Linkage Cell at Rajarata University.

title: Research commercialization initiatives
description: Initiation of collaboration with the commercial crowd for business linkages with the university as the Director, Business Linkage Cell, Rajarata University of Sri Lanka.
